attributes.action: Michael Thompson. Brian Staniford. Alec Alexander. Lorraine Pearse.  Margaret Sweeney. John Clarke. Anne Marie.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, of Link-Age/Countrywide, call on the Prime Minister to bring UK state pensions in line with Europe.

Today's pensioners were obliged to contribute to the National Insurance fund throughout their working lives, and they were told they would receive a decent state pension on their retirement.  This is just not happening.

The UK has one in five pensioners from a 12 million generation living in poverty, and the UK also has a very high percentage of elderly people's untimely deaths through the winter months and other cold weather spells due to the UK's meagre state pension on-a-par with ever higher utility bills.

Many of our elderly people are going without food to pay their utility bills, in the fourth richest economy in the world.
